channel.title: Papers on Raphaël Huleux
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Raphaël Huleux

item.title: Labor Income Inequality and Monetary Policy
item.description: This paper studies the impact of rising permanent labor income inequality on monetary policy.

item.title: From Income to Wealth Inequality in the U.S.: General Equilibrium Matters
item.description: This paper studies the impact of the increase in permanent labor income inequality on the distribution of wealth in the U.S.
